summary: The diff adds a React+TS/Tailwind single-page site with sections (Hero, About, Services, Portfolio, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact), a fixed header with the required nav items and active-section highlighting logic, a reusable gradient CTA button, and a Motoko backend method to accept contact form submissions. However, several requirements around using the exact provided copy strings and storing timestamps are not evidenced as implemented, and a few unrequested features/utilities were added.

missing_requirements.requirement: About section must contain the exact provided paragraph text.
missing_requirements.reason: The AboutSection copy appears custom and the BuildRequest requires using exact user-provided copy where specified; the diff does not show that exact provided text being used.

missing_requirements.requirement: Client Results section must show the exact provided intro text sentence.
missing_requirements.reason: The ClientResultsSection intro sentence shown appears to be custom; the exact provided sentence is not evidenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Testimonials section must include the exact provided supporting text.
missing_requirements.reason: The TestimonialsSection supporting text shown appears custom; the exact provided supporting text is not evidenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Contact Us section must show the exact provided text.
missing_requirements.reason: The ContactSection intro text shown appears custom; the exact provided text is not evidenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend must store contact submissions including a timestamp.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend ContactForm type includes id, name, email, phone, message, hasResponse but no timestamp field is shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes a promotional/referral link to caffeine.ai ('Built with ... using caffeine.ai').
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest requirements/non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend exposes a query to list all submitted contact forms (getSubmittedForms).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; only a backend endpoint to accept/store submissions was required.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend includes blob-storage mixin and related imports (MixinStorage), plus an unrequested hasResponse field in ContactForm.
hallucinated_features.reason: Blob storage and response-tracking were not requested as part of the contact form storage requirements.
